Message: Hi
Hi, my name is Amanda. How can I help you?
Hi
I'd like to exclude audience network from my ads please
Exclusions are limited to your targeting within your ad set settings. You can update targeting to include/exclude audiences from that portal.
I don't have that option turned on
I tried to and the message said I should message you guys to do it for me
Please give me a minute while I investigate. I see you have several organizations/ad accounts. Can you confirm which ad account this is for?
Satus Consulting Firm LLC
Thank you.
Great news, our Account Manager Sara who you've worked with would like to carry this conversation on via Skype (your regular communication channel) to better assist your needs. Would that work?
Yes thank you
Thank you for reaching out. If there's anything else I can assist with, please let me know. Have a wonderful day!
Andrew Taylor left the conversation.
Hi
Hello! How can I assist you today?
my ad has been rejected for political. Wondering if I can get it approved?

I'm sorry to hear that your ad was rejected. To help you better, could you please provide more details about the content of your ad? In the meantime, I recommend reviewing NewsBreakâ€™s policies and guidelines to ensure your ad aligns with their requirements. You can find more information here: [My ad got rejected - What's next](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next).
Can I talk to support?
I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away. If you still need to contact support, I can send an email on your behalf.
My ad got rejected but I think it followed policy

I understand your concern. Sometimes ads can be rejected due to specific reasons that might not be immediately clear. I recommend checking the detailed feedback provided by Ad Support in the email you received. You can also review the [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy) to ensure your ad complies with all guidelines. If you still believe your ad followed the policy, you can reach out to Ad Support for further clarification.
Ok how do I reach ad support?

You can reach Ad Support by submitting a request through the NewsBreak Help Center. Here's the link to get started: [Submit a request](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next). If you need further assistance, I can send an email on your behalf.
